column1:
(iii) Where the total income
exceeds Rs. 5,00,000/- but does
not exceed Rs. 10,00,000/-.
column2:
Rs. 25,000/- + 20% of the amount
by which total income exceeds
Rs. 5,00,000/-.

column1:
(iv) Where the total income
exceeds Rs. 10,00,000/-.
column2:
Rs. 1,25,000/- + 30% of the
amount by which the total
income exceeds Rs. 10,00,000/-.
